KnowledgeBase.Title: divi
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: addi muli subi iadd isub imul idiv

Function.Description: The divi function returns the quotient of its arguments as an Integer quantity.

Brief.Overview: The divi function returns the quotient of its arguments as an Integer quantity. The divi function accepts any numeric operand and performs any necessary type conversions prior to performing the division.
Brief.Usage: Use the divi function to compute the quotient of two or more numbers and return the result as an Integer. The divi function will truncate any fractional portion of its operands before dividing.

Syntax.Return: Returns the result of the division operation.
